General.Name: EMTEK (Shenzhen) Co. Ltd.
General.Description: EMTEK (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd. operates as a third-party testing institution in China. The company provides schedule site testing and certification validation, as well as technical services and solutions, such as testing, certification, and standard research and development services. It serves customers in the daily consumer goods, new energy, industrial products and components, life science, etc. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
